attributes.action: require the utility companies to liaise with each other before digging up the roads!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a utility company proposes to dig up the road to run a new pipeline etc, it would be sensible if they contacted the other services to see if they have the intention of doing work there too in the near future. It is most annoying for residents and road users to find that no sooner has the road been opened, it is dug up again! One expample is the main road through Coedpoeth, Wrexham which seems to be constantly in the process of being dug up!
